publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5732 Stewart Stevenson: The A90 (Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route) (Craibstone Junction) Special Road Scheme 2010—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the A90 (Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route) (Craibstone Junction) Special Road Scheme 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-5732 Stewart Stevenson: The A90 (Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route) (Craibstone Junction) Special Road Scheme 2010—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee recommends that the A90 (Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route) (Craibstone Junction) Special Road Scheme 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
